articles.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has called on European countries and global financial institutions to consider reducing the devastating effect of the COVID-19 pandemic on African economies by restructuring debt portfolios and providing complete debt relief.

articles.title: How a change in the Pfizer's storage temperature could completely change vaccine access - CBC.ca
articles.description: The Pfizer vaccine can now be stored at typical refrigerator temperatures in Europe for weeks longer than previously thought, a move that could have major implications on the rollout of vaccines across Canada and the world.
